channel.title: phoenix-framework on Amit Gaur
channel.description: Recent content in phoenix-framework on Amit Gaur

item.title: How to use Digital Ocean Spaces for Arc Ecto file uploads
item.description: In this I explain how to use Digital Ocean spaces instead of Amazon S3 for uploading files using Arc Ecto

item.title: How to get remote ip from x-forwarded-for header in Phoenix
item.description: In this I explain how to get correct remote ip in phoenix framework from x-forwarded-for. When the server is being proxied through something like nginx.

item.title: How to use UUIDs as Primary Key with ecto
item.description: In this, I explain how to use UUIDs as primary key instead of IDs when using ecto with Phoenix Framework.
